attributes.action: BEFORE agreeing to take ANY refugees or asylum seekers OBTAIN A MANDATE FROM THE PEOPLE WHO ARE GOING TO HAVE TO PAY FOR IT.
attributes.additional_details: Our government does not represent the people of this country and they should NOT have authority to commit the people of the country to any long term costs which would accrue through increasing the population of this country.  THE PEOPLE HAVE A RIGHT TO A VOTE TO DETERMINE THEIR OWN FUTURE.  Again, none of us voted for what our government is doing and we demand a vote on this issue.
